'''Genshin Impact × POCO''' is a collaborative effort between [[Genshin Impact]] creators [[miHoYo]] and the Chinese electronics company {{w|POCO (company)|POCO}}.

==Collaborations==
To date, there has been '''1''' collaboration between ''Genshin Impact'' and POCO.

===POCO Buds Pro (Klee)===
For the Chinese version of this collaboration, please see [[Genshin Impact x Xiaomi]].<br>
This collaboration features a [https://www.po.co/global/product/poco-buds-pro-genshin-impact-edition/ POCO Buds Pro] with a custom theme centred around [[Klee]]. The device comes in special packaging with the same theming style.<br>
Other physical accessories include:
* 1x [[Dodoco Tales]] themed carrying case
* 1x "Klee's backpack" holding pouch
* Special Klee-themed English voice-overs for certain interactions
